full_summary:
# Request for Standing Offer

## Notice

*   Title: French Virtual Language Training for Atlantic Region
*   Reference: PW-22-01010348
*   Contracting Agency: Employment and Social Development Canada
*   Contact Information:
    *   Name: Mimi Rabouin
    *   Email: [nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca](mailto:nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca)
    *   Address: 142 Promenade du Portage, Gatineau, QC J8X 2K3

## Opportunity

The Canadian government is soliciting Regional Individual Standing Offers (RISO) for French virtual language training services across several work streams, including:

*   Full-time training (group and individual)
*   Part-time training (group and individual)
*   Learner assessment
*   Tutoring for preparation to second language evaluation tests
*   Group conversation

Services will be required for employees residing in the Atlantic regions (New Brunswick, Nova Scotia, Prince Edward Island, and Newfoundland) during business hours.

## Terms and Conditions

*   Initial Standing Offer duration: 2 years, with options for 3-year extensions
*   Maximum number of Standing Offers: 2
*   Offerors must be capable of providing services in all applicable work streams
*   Separate procurement process for locations within Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements (CLCAs) regions

## Security Requirements

*   Clearances or security screening may be required for delivery personnel or trainers

## Submissions

*   Documents can be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French)
*   Supporting documents, including the Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) and appendices, are available [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/18/1e4d5b57938ef4a145313bd03d6d2697/100022228-atl-annex_a_and_appendix_-_atl.zip)
*   The Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) is available in both English and French [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/18/a6b34019d24862f30673ccb6b82fbbc6/doc100022228-atl_.pdf)
